comments: Claxton (BKN) places his forearm against Siakam's (IND) side and marginal contact occurs as Siakam loses control of the ball on his own.
Claxton (BKN) contests Siakam's (IND) jump shot and the contact after the release, and follow-through, is marginal.
Nesmith (IND) briefly grasps Finney-Smith's (BKN) jersey as they come together off ball prior to correcting.
Haliburton (IND) is moving alongside Bridges' (BKN) path and the contact during the driving shot attempt is marginal.
Nesmith (IND) and Finney-Smith (BKN) mutually engage and immediately disengage as marginal contact occurs during the rebound.
Siakam (IND) initiates contact with Bridges (BKN), who has established a legal guarding position in his path and the contact dislodges him from his defensive positon.
Nembhard (IND) briefly places his hands on Finney-Smith (BKN) and marginal contact occurs as Finney-Smith moves towards the basket.
Haliburton (IND) moves alongside Schroder's (BKN) path and marginal body contact occurs during the driving shot attempt.
Finney-Smith (BKN) brushes Siakam's (IND) arm and the marginal contact does not affect Siakam's ability to get to the pass.
Toppin (IND) initiates contact with Clowney's (BKN) arm  which causes him to lose control of the ball.
Haliburton (IND) and Schroder (BKN) are performing legal moves at the same time when Haliburton steps on Schroder's foot, making the foot contact incidental.

Nembhard (IND) slightly lifts his arm and marginal contact occurs with Thomas' (BKN) head/face off-ball. Contact to an opponent's head/face can be deemed marginal when the result of a natural basketball move, provided the contact is not disproportionate or uncontrolled.
Thomas (BKN) establishes himself in Nesmith's (IND) path and does not deliver illegal contact.
Nesmith (IND) commits a take foul on Bridges (BKN).
Bridges (BKN) contests Toppin's (IND) jump shot and the contact after the release, with Toppin's lower body is marginal.
Thomas (BKN) briefly grasps Nesmith's (IND) arm and immediately slides his hand off as Nesmith gathers the rebound.
Thomas (BKN) applies his hand to Nesmith's (IND) front and marginal body contact occurs as he releases the pass.
Schroder (BKN) avoids making contact with Haliburton's (IND) body during the jump shot attempt.
Nembhard (IND) commits a take foul on Wilson (BKN).
Claxton (BKN) grasps Toppin's (IND) jersey and immediately releases it as marginal contact occurs during the rebound.
